title: Build and Deploy a MacOS style Portfolio with React, GSAP & Tailwind
description:
In this video, you’ll build a macOS-style portfolio from scratch using React, GSAP, and Tailwind CSS. Step by step, you’ll recreate the interactive Apple Dock, draggable and resizable application windows, and more; all while learning how to use Higher-Order Components and manage global state with Zustand. All of it is packed with smooth GSAP animations and clean, reusable React architecture.
